channel.title: [PI] How do I Change Slayer XP?
channel.description: I'm just wondering how to change the XP rates for slayer monsters. I looked on google, Rune - Serv, Rune - locuz, and here. I also looked through tons of files in my src file. Can't find it. Anyone know where it is? Rep++ and an E-hug for whoever helps. :P

item.title: [PI] How do I Change Slayer XP?
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Mhm I believe so, I haven’t messed around with PI for a while…

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I Change Slayer XP?

item.title: [PI] How do I Change Slayer XP?
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Hm, I’m pretty sure its in config.java just look for something similar to this public static final int SLAYER_EXPERIENCE = 50; change the ‘50’ to the rate you want it at.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I Change Slayer XP?
